# Yu WenHao (余文皓)

> I Build Products with AI. 14 years away from engineering, I used AI to build complete SaaS products independently. I write about AI-powered development, productivity systems, and solo entrepreneurship.

## About

- Site: https://yu-wenhao.com
- Email: mail@yu-wenhao.com
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/hence/
- Languages: Traditional Chinese (zh-TW, default), English (en)

## What I Do

I'm an independent developer and writer based in Taiwan. After 14 years away from coding (working as PM, doing project management and data analysis), I discovered Claude Code in mid-2025 and built a SaaS product independently in 6 months. I hold an MDA degree from Minerva University and combine 15 years of hands-on experience with AI tools.

Core belief: In the AI era, individuals can create more.

## Products

- [AI Resume Advisor](https://yu-wenhao.com/zh-TW/products/ai-resume-advisor/): Resume diagnostic and optimization tool
- [NeatToolkit](https://yu-wenhao.com/zh-TW/products/neatoolkit/): Free online tools (background removal, video compression, YouTube subtitle download)
- [LinkedIn Resume Checker](https://yu-wenhao.com/zh-TW/products/linkedin-resume-checker/): Chrome extension for LinkedIn job matching

## Blog Categories

- **Building Products**: No-Code, AI tools, from idea to launch
- **Productivity**: Knowledge management, workflows, systems thinking
- **Life & Learning**: Book reviews, values, long-term thinking
